LanguageData.TraderRatHireling.title: hireling
LanguageData.TraderRatHireling.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] offer their services for a price.
LanguageData.TraderRatGladiator.title: gladiator
LanguageData.TraderRatGladiator.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a former gladiator, now offering their services for whoever pays.
LanguageData.TraderRatBruiser.title: bruiser
LanguageData.TraderRatBruiser.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] keeps busy as a bruiser for hire.
LanguageData.TraderRatMercenary.title: mercenary
LanguageData.TraderRatAssistant.title: trade assistant
LanguageData.TraderRatAssistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a assistant of the clan leader.
LanguageData.TraderRatClek.title: trade clerk
LanguageData.TraderRatClek.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] works as a clerk for one of the smaller clans.
LanguageData.TraderRatTrader.title: trader
LanguageData.TraderRatTrader.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the major traders of the free standing clans.
LanguageData.SkavenMasterMoulder.title: Master moulder
LanguageData.SkavenMasterMoulder.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is at the peak of the clan moulders. A true master at [PAWN_possessive] vile and gruesome work.
LanguageData.SkavenMoulder.title: Moulder
LanguageData.SkavenMoulder.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a bio engineer of the clan Moulder. Successfully earning [PAWN_possessive] place in the clan, moulding vile creations deep under the surface.
LanguageData.MoulderGuard.title: moulder guard
LanguageData.MoulderGuard.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] guards the master moulders laboratories and often finds [PAWN_objective]self fighting off whatever monstrous creature is on the loose.
LanguageData.MoulderAssistant.title: Moulder assistant
LanguageData.MoulderAssistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] helps out the master moulders in their well guarded laboratories. Though [PAWN_possessive] masters guared their research, [PAWN_pronoun] has managed to steal what knowledge [PAWN_pronoun] can. Often spending [PAWN_possessive] short spare time reverse engineering tools and experimenting on [PAWN_possessive] own.
LanguageData.MoulderChildAssistant.title: young assistant
LanguageData.MoulderChildAssistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken as young to act as a assistant to one of the master moulders. [PAWN_pronoun] mostly ran errands and wrestled with experiments to keep them down under procedures. Still [PAWN_pronoun] managed to learn one or two things from handling [PAWN_possessive] masters tools.
LanguageData.MoulderSlaveBorn.title: lowborn
LanguageData.MoulderSlaveBorn.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the pits with the rest. Fending for themself and forced to obey the clans whim. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to survive in clan Moulders hold. Living on scraps and managing to avoid some of the moulders experiments.
LanguageData.MoulderClanBorn.title: clan born
LanguageData.MoulderClanBorn.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was clan born, living under the Moulder clan. [PAWN_pronoun] was tossed out to handle the monstros creations with the rest of the pack. Learning how to wrangle wolf rats and ogres.
LanguageData.MoulderPromising.title: promising
LanguageData.MoulderPromising.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was clan born, but [PAWN_pronoun] showed promise from young age. [PAWN_pronoun] handled the various beast, studied them and tinkered on [PAWN_possessive] own creations.
LanguageData.SkavenEngineer.title: engineer
LanguageData.SkavenEngineer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a skaven engineer. Spending most time crafting various weapons and constructions to aid the clan or fighting on the battlefields with their various contraptions.
LanguageData.SkavenScribe.title: scribe
LanguageData.SkavenScribe.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a skaven scribe. Of what little history is stored in the empire. [PAWN_nameDef] handles most of it.
LanguageData.SkavenSeer.title: seer
LanguageData.SkavenSeer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a highly regarded seer. Serving their master, the seers take part in every move of the empire.
LanguageData.ClanratGrunt.title: clanrat
LanguageData.ClanratGrunt.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] belongs to one of the thousands of clans scattered throughout the empire.
LanguageData.ClanratExSlave.title: former slave
LanguageData.ClanratExSlave.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a slave for a while, now [PAWN_nameDef] has risen and joined one of the many clans throughout the empire.
LanguageData.ClanratGladiator.title: gladiator
LanguageData.ClanratGladiator.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] fights in the skaven arena and lived to fight for another day.
LanguageData.ClanratRunner.title: runner
LanguageData.ClanratRunner.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] runs errands and does the dirty work of the clan.
LanguageData.ClanratMarksman.title: marksman
LanguageData.ClanratMarksman.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natrual crack-shot with the crossbow. [PAWN_nameDef] have survived numeral battles staying on the sideline with the crossbow.
LanguageData.ClanratSmart.title: survivor
LanguageData.ClanratSmart.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] knows all the ins and out of the skaven society and lives more than just a good life in the burrows.
LanguageData.SlaveratExClan.title: former clanrat
LanguageData.SlaveratExClan.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be part of a ruined clan. Now [PAWN_nameDef] has consigned to life as a slave rat.
LanguageData.SlaveratAmbitious.title: ambitious slave
LanguageData.SlaveratAmbitious.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has not given up and dreams of climbing the ranks.
LanguageData.SlaveratAlwaysSlave.title: consigned slave
LanguageData.SlaveratAlwaysSlave.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has been a slave for the longest time. History in the eye of a skaven is short and [PAWN_nameDef] own history is as short if not shorter.
LanguageData.SlaveratGladiator.title: gladiator
LanguageData.SlaveratGladiator.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is know for fighting in the arena and surviving for the next fight.
LanguageData.SlaveratCourier.title: courier
LanguageData.SlaveratCourier.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a courier for one of the higher clans. Delivering messages and doing the dirty work has given [PAWN_nameDef] alot of mixed experience.
LanguageData.SlaveratTrash.title: slave
LanguageData.SlaveratTrash.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is of the lowest of the lowest. A struggeling rat trying to scrape by in a harsh world where the strong rules.
LanguageData.SlaveratExScribe.title: former scribe
LanguageData.SlaveratExScribe.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be of a higher standing, working as a scribe for one of the clans.
LanguageData.SkavenBornClan.title: clanrat
LanguageData.SkavenBornSlave.title: born in slavery
LanguageData.SkavenBornSlave.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a slave but managed to prove themself and climb to the highest reaches.
LanguageData.SkavenSeerBorn.title: taken as a seer candidate
LanguageData.SkavenSeerBorn.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken from birth to be trained as a seer.
LanguageData.ClanratBornClan.title: clanrat
LanguageData.SlaveratBornSlaveClan.title: born in slavery
LanguageData.SlaveratBornSlave.title: born in slavery
LanguageData.SlaveratBornClan.title: clanrat
LanguageData.StormverminLeader.title: Fangleader candidate
LanguageData.StormverminLeader.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a highly regarded Stormvermin. Cunning, ruthless and ambitious.
LanguageData.StormverminGrunt.title: loyalist
LanguageData.StormverminGrunt.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] life belonged to the stormvermins a true trained loyalist.
LanguageData.StormverminGladiator.title: gladiator
LanguageData.StormverminGladiator.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] often fought in the arena. There was no greater joy in [PAWN_possessive] life.
LanguageData.StormverminUnkown.title: uknown birth
LanguageData.StormverminUnkown.baseDescription: Where [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed or where [PAWN_pronoun] came from is unkown. Seemingly out of nowhere [PAWN_pronoun] stod with the rest of the Stormvermin candidates.
LanguageData.StormverminExcellent.title: ruthless
LanguageData.StormverminExcellent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was extra ruthless. All the other skaven have always been lesser kinds to [PAWN_objective]. Nothing was going to stop [PAWN_nameDef].
LanguageData.StormverminBornSlave.title: lowborn
LanguageData.StormverminBornSlave.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was lowborn, but predetermined by destiny made it so [PAWN_pronoun] was taken in with the other Stormvermin candidates.
LanguageData.StormverminBornClan.title: clan born
LanguageData.StormverminBornClan.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a clan, taken from birth to fullfil [PAWN_possessive] destiny as a Stormvermin.
